page.title: 11INDUSTRY2 - NORTH TAWTON
page.content: {NORTH TAWTON CHEESE FACTORY}is the largest mechanised Cheddar Cheese factory in Europe,capable of processing 772,000 litres of milk per day into 77 tonnes of cheese and 44 tonnes of export grade whey powder.A considerable amount of Skimmed Milk Powder is produced for the home and export market-Cream is produced for the manufacture of butter at Honiton. In{March 1980 H.R.H.The Prince of {Wales}officially opened the United Kingdom's first Rennet Casein plant. This dual purpose plant capable of producing Rennet and Acid Casein meets a growing demand for Casein, particularly for export to Italy and the United States of America.{ {EFFLUENT.}Aerators floating on 23million litre lagoons break down milk solid waste to a B.O.D.>10 p.p.m. and suspended solids of 15 p.p.m.
